name: Sweet Candy Mania (Mathch3 puzzle game for saga lovers)

description:
Sweet Candy mania is a candy crush type game. - the match 3 sensation like blast is here.

swap candy to match 3 or more and create bonus point. sweet candy mania is the ultimate free puzzle game for all.

sweet candy mania features:-

-300 Sodalicious levels in classic mode with score and beat the best score.
-New Candy sweet boost mode.
-New Testy lollipop booster.
-match 3 same candy to get score.
-Easy and Fun to play
-Play 1 level after the complete open other level open one by one
 
Two Exciting case *Arcade *Classic


match candy puzzle game for more than 300+ puzzles each one is unique and lot of fun with amazing challenges.
match the candy blast the way it gives you the fun with the 300+ dash game


AMAZING PUZZLE with the lot of excitement and large blast of the candy puzzle
TOP QUALITY GAME with the fun and blast if totally free to play,

fans of candy crush and jewel games will love Sweet candy mania game ,download today and start your adventure.
